headline: Bloom Energy Has Declined 20% Since Tuesday. The Clean Energy Choice For AI Data Centers Just Topped Earnings.
summary: Bloom Energy stock tumbled Wednesday and continued to retreat Thursday prior to the Q4 earnings release after the stock market close.

headline: Do Wall Street Analysts Like American Electric Power Stock?
summary: Despite American Electric Power's outperformance relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautiously optimistic outlook about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Bloom Energy’s Big Utility And AI Deals Test Rich Valuation And Execution
summary: Bloom Energy (NYSE:BE) announced a $2.65b fuel cell sale to American Electric Power alongside a 20 year offtake agreement. The company also revealed a $5b partnership with Brookfield Asset Management to supply power for AI data centers. These agreements significantly expand Bloom Energy’s presence in utility scale generation and AI focused data center power. For investors watching NYSE:BE, these contracts come as the stock trades around $147.35, with a very large 1 year return and a 49.3%...
